definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Premillennialists believe Jesus will come back to make His kingdom in this life.
sentences.chinese: 前千禧年主義者認爲耶穌會回來建立一個屬世的國度。

sentences.english: Rest no longer satisfied with thy dwarfish attainments, but press forward to things more sublime and heavenly.
sentences.chinese: 不要再滿足於屬世的成就，要努力奔向屬天的事物。

sentences.english: Do not riches take to themselves wings and fly away?Our health is equally precarious.
sentences.chinese: 屬世的貲財也確是如此，財富會長翼飛去。
